room_title: Escape room "The Sword of Zorro" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
review: We did the Zorro room with a group of 7 with ages varying from 10-39 we did not finish it but we still had an amazing time. Our guide Garret was very funny and we really appreciated his help. Each of puzzles were different and fun to solve. I would 100% recommend this experience to others.

room_title: Escape room "The Sword of Zorro" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
review: I’ve done lots of escape rooms this was one of the best. Nicolas was amazing. If you haven’t been you should check it out.

room_title: Escape room "The Sword of Zorro" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
review: A group of friends and I did the Mystery of Zorro room for a bridal shower activity. We had SUCH a great time and Chad (Mr. Green) was awesome and very helpful! We didn't solve the whole room, but still had a blast.
